author: Christine Rousselle
title: Dylann Roof Sentenced To Death
text:
Dylann Roof Sentenced To Death Share 
UPDATE (4:51 PM): Dylann Roof has been sentenced to death. #BREAKING : Dylann Roof gets the death penalty for Emanuel massacre https://t.co/8DO0NE2QT8 — CBS 13 News (@WGME) January 10, 2017 BREAKING: Dylann Roof sentenced to execution for killing 9 black church members; 1st to get death penalty for federal hate crimes #RoofTrial pic.twitter.com/ndxRClZP3w — Meg Kinnard (@MegKinnardAP) January 10, 2017 ---Original Post--- 
Jurors have reached a verdict in the penalty phase of Dylann Roof's murder trial. Their decision will be delivered shortly. 
Roof faces the death penalty for his murder of nine parishioners of the Mother Emanuel AME Church in Charleston last summer. He was found guilty on all counts and has not expressed a shred of remorse for his actions. 
This post will be updated when the verdict is delivered.
